body: $AAPL how much is the market down pre market ?

$SPY Looks like the Santa Rally will be late and little, as a country we have talked ourselves into a recession, we want a recession like a drunk wants a another drink, they know it is bad, but it is easy.

As long as we fight over things we can't fix anyway, the market will slip. Why should $AAPL or even $AMC drop tomorrow? What changed, we all use our IPhones 25 hours a day, (you just checked your mail) and Spiderman came home. 

Bring back "don't worry, be happy" or just have another drink,me I am drinking
